mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, menu_code, menu_name, permission_code, permission_name, required_permission, create_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requiredPermission,jdbcType=BIT}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update sys_permission set menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_code = #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, required_permission = #{requiredPermission,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, menu_code, menu_name, permission_code, permission_name, required_permission from sys_permission

SELECT u.id userId, u.nickname nickname, u.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, p.menu_code menuCode, p.permission_code permissionCode FROM (SELECT id,nickname,role_id FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND delete_status='1') u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id
select menu_code menuCode from sys_permission order by id
select permission_code permissionCode from sys_permission order by id
